import styles from './layout.module.scss' import { Link, Outlet, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { ChangeEvent, FormEvent, useMemo, useState } from 'react' import { debounce } from 'lodash' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { searchValue } from 'states/inputSearchValue' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import { getSearchListApi } from 'services/bookSearchApi' import { SearchStructure } from 'types/searchStructure' import cx from 'classnames' const Layout = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [input, setInput] = useState('') const [search, setSearch] = useRecoil(searchValue) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const debounceSearch = useMemo( () => debounce((value) => { setSearch(value) }, 1000), [setSearch] ) const handleChange = (e: ChangeEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget setInput(value) debounceSearch(value) } const handleSubmit = (e: FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() navigate(`searchresult/${input}`) setInput('') let searchStoreArray = store.get('searchStore') const tmpArray = searchStoreArray.filter((item: string) => item !== input) searchStoreArray = [...tmpArray, input] store.set('searchStore', searchStoreArray) } const { data } = useQuery( ['getSearchListApi', search, input], () => getSearchListApi(search, 1).then((res) => res.data), { enabled: !!search, } ) const searchList = data && data.documents.map((item: SearchStructure) => (
  • {item.title} {item.authors}
    • )) const handleClickInput = () => { setIsOpen(true) } return (
    오늘의책
      {input && searchList}
    • Home
    • 추천도서
    • 이벤트
    ) } export default Layout
